Detailed Description

Collection of functions for servo filtering of DM commands and uplink pointing loop.

Function Documentation

Add low order NGS modes to DM actuator commands for AHST and MVST.

00031     switch(simu->parms->tomo.split){

static void shift_inte ( int  nap,
double *  ap,
dcell **  inte 
) [static]

prepare the integrator by shifting commands.

similar to laos. inte->p[0]=inte->p[0]*ap[0]+inte->p[1]*ap[1]+... 

00049                                                          {
00050     dcell *tmp=NULL;
00051     dcell *keepjunk=inte[nap-1];
00052     for(int iap=nap-1; iap>=0; iap--){
00053     dcelladd(&tmp,1,inte[iap],ap[iap]);
00054     if(iap>0){
00055         inte[iap]=inte[iap-1];//shifting
00056     }else{
00057         inte[iap]=tmp;//new command.
00058     }
00059     }
00060     dcellfree(keepjunk);
00061 }

static void typeII_filter ( TYPEII_T *  MtypeII,
dmat *  gain,
double  dtngs,
dcell *  Merr 
) [static]

Do type II servo filtering, except the last integrator. 

00065                                                                                    {
00066     //lead filter
00067     double gg,ga,gs;
00068     if(!MtypeII->lead){
00069     MtypeII->lead=dcellnew(Merr->nx, Merr->ny);
00070     for(long imlo=0; imlo<Merr->nx*Merr->ny; imlo++){
00071         long nmod=Merr->p[imlo]->nx;
00072         MtypeII->lead->p[imlo]=dnew(nmod,1);
00073     }
00074     }
00075     if(!MtypeII->errlast){
00076     MtypeII->errlast=dcellnew(Merr->nx, Merr->ny);
00077     for(long imlo=0; imlo<Merr->nx*Merr->ny; imlo++){
00078         long nmod=Merr->p[imlo]->nx;
00079         MtypeII->errlast->p[imlo]=dnew(nmod,1);
00080     }
00081     }
00082     PDMAT(gain, pgain);
00083     for(long imlo=0; imlo<Merr->nx*Merr->ny; imlo++){
00084     const long nmod=Merr->p[imlo]->nx;
00085     long indmul=0;
00086     //if(nmod!=5){
00087     //   warning("nmod != 5\n");
00088     //}
00089     if(gain->ny==nmod){
00090         indmul=1;
00091     }else if(gain->ny==1){
00092         indmul=0;
00093     }else if(gain->ny>1 && gain->ny < nmod){
00094         indmul=0;//temporary; use only first column to filter all modes
00095     }else{
00096         error("Wrong format\n");
00097     }
00098     info("nmod=%ld, indmul=%ld\n",nmod,indmul);
00099 
00100     double *mlead=MtypeII->lead->p[imlo]->p;
00101     double *merr=Merr->p[imlo]->p;
00102     double *merrlast=MtypeII->errlast->p[imlo]->p;
00103         
00104     for(long imod=0; imod<nmod; imod++){
00105         long indm=imod * indmul;
00106         gg=pgain[indm][0];
00107         ga=pgain[indm][1];
00108         gs=pgain[indm][2]/dtngs;
00109             
00110         mlead[imod] = (gg/(2*ga*gs+1))*(mlead[imod]*(2*ga*gs-1)
00111                         +merr[imod]*(2*gs+1)
00112                         -merrlast[imod]*(2*gs-1));
00113     }
00114     }
00115     //record Merrlast for use next time
00116     dcellcp(&MtypeII->errlast, Merr);
00117     //first integrator
00118     dcelladd(&MtypeII->firstint, 1, MtypeII->lead, 1);
00119 }

void filter_cl ( SIM_T *  simu  ) 

Update DM command for next cycle using info from last cycle (two cycle delay) in closed loop mode. 

00123                            {
00124     /*
00125       2009-11-02: Moved to the end of isim loop to update
00126       for next step.  only need to cache a single dmerrlast
00127       now.
00128 
00129       2009-12-23: Updated low fs to do lead filter/type II
00130       
00131       2010-01-07: Create an option to merge the last
00132       integrator in the hi/lo loop to simulation the actual
00133       block diagram. removed dmreal_hi, Mreal_lo;
00134       
00135       2010-01-08: Changed the filtering scheme by computing
00136       dm command for next cycle instead of maintianing last
00137       step error information.
00138 
00139       2010-01-13: Implemented apdm. 
00140       a(n)=a(n-1)+ep*e(n-2) or 
00141       a(n)=0.5*(a(n-1)+a(n-2))+ep*e(n-2);
00142     */
00143     const PARMS_T *parms=simu->parms;
00144     if(!parms->sim.closeloop) error("Invalid call\n");
00145   
00146     //copy dm computed in last cycle. This is used in next cycle (already after perfevl)
00147     const SIM_CFG_T *simt=&(parms->sim);
00148     if(parms->sim.fuseint){
00149     dcellcp(&simu->dmreal,simu->dmint[0]);
00150     }else{
00151     dcellcp(&simu->dmreal,simu->dmint_hi[0]);
00152     addlow2dm(&simu->dmreal,simu,simu->Mint_lo[0], 1);
00153     }
00154     calc_cachedm(simu);
00155     if(parms->sim.fuseint){
00156     shift_inte(simt->napdm,simt->apdm,simu->dmint);
00157     }else{
00158     shift_inte(simt->napdm,simt->apdm,simu->dmint_hi);
00159     if(parms->tomo.split){
00160         shift_inte(simt->napngs,simt->apngs,simu->Mint_lo);
00161     }
00162     }
00163     //High order.
00164     if(simu->dmerr_hi){
00165     switch(simt->servotype_hi){
00166     case 1://simple servo
00167         if(parms->sim.fuseint){
00168         dcelladd(&simu->dmint[0], 1, simu->dmerr_hi, simt->epdm);
00169         }else{
00170         dcelladd(&simu->dmint_hi[0], 1, simu->dmerr_hi, simt->epdm);
00171         }
00172         break;
00173     default:
00174         error("Not implemented yet\n");
00175     }
00176     }
00177     //Low order, modal in split tomography only. 
00178     //Merr_lo is non-empty only if in split mode and (isim+1)%dtrat==0 as governed by tomofit
00179     if(parms->tomo.split && simu->Merr_lo){
00180     switch(simt->servotype_lo){
00181     case 1:{
00182         if(parms->sim.fuseint){
00183         addlow2dm(&simu->dmint[0],simu,simu->Merr_lo, simt->epngs);
00184         }else{
00185         dcelladd(&simu->Mint_lo[0], 1, simu->Merr_lo, simt->epngs);
00186         }
00187     }
00188         break;
00189     case 2:{ //type II with lead filter
00190         info("LoWFS DM output\n");
00191         typeII_filter(simu->MtypeII_lo, simu->gtypeII_lo, simu->dtlo, simu->Merr_lo);
00192         //second integrator, merged to LGS integrator.
00193         if(parms->sim.fuseint){
00194         addlow2dm(&simu->dmint[0], simu, simu->MtypeII_lo->firstint, 1);
00195         }else{
00196         dcelladd(&simu->Mint_lo[0], 1, simu->MtypeII_lo->firstint, 1);
00197         }
00198     }
00199         break;
00200     default:
00201         error("Not implemented yet");
00202     }
00203     }
00204     static int initialized=0;
00205     static int cast_tt=0;
00206     static int do_clip=0;
00207     static int do_hist=0;
00208     if(!initialized){
00209     for(int idm=0; idm<parms->ndm; idm++){
00210         if(parms->dm[idm].hist){
00211         do_hist=1;
00212         }
00213         if(!isinf(parms->dm[idm].stroke)){
00214         do_clip=1;
00215         }
00216     }
00217     if(parms->save.dmpttr){
00218         do_clip=1;
00219     }
00220     cast_tt=do_hist||do_clip;
00221     initialized=1;
00222     }
00223     if(cast_tt){
00224     if(!parms->sim.fuseint){
00225         error("Sorry, clipping only works in fuseint=1 mode\n");
00226     }
00227     }
00228     if(cast_tt && simu->dmint[0]){
00229     /*
00230       Here we are simulation a Tip/Tilt Mirror by
00231       casting global tip/tilt out from DM commands, do
00232       the saturation and histogram analysis. 
00233       
00234       We then add back the tip/tilt to the DM to
00235       simulate the DM tip/tilt stage, or in another
00236       word, to save a ray tracing from the tip/tilt
00237       mirror.
00238      */
00239     int ndm=parms->ndm;
00240     dcell *ptt=dcellnew(ndm,1);
00241     const RECON_T *recon=simu->recon;
00242     for(int idm=0; idm<ndm; idm++){
00243         ptt->p[idm]=dnew(3,1);
00244         double *ptt1=ptt->p[idm]->p;
00245         loc_calc_ptt(NULL,ptt1, recon->aloc[idm],0,
00246              recon->aimcc->p[idm],NULL,
00247              simu->dmint[0]->p[idm]->p);
00248         loc_remove_ptt(simu->dmint[0]->p[idm]->p, 
00249                ptt1,recon->aloc[idm]);
00250     }
00251         /*
00252       clip integrator. This both limits the output and
00253       feeds back the clip since we are acting on the integrator directly.
00254     */
00255     if(do_clip){
00256         for(int idm=0; idm<parms->ndm; idm++){
00257         int nclip=dclip(simu->dmint[0]->p[idm], 
00258                 -parms->dm[idm].stroke,
00259                 parms->dm[idm].stroke);
00260         if(nclip>0){
00261             info("DM %d: %d actuators clipped\n", idm, nclip);
00262         }
00263         }
00264     }
00265     if(do_hist){
00266         if(!simu->dmhist){
00267         long nnx[parms->ndm];
00268         long nny[parms->ndm];
00269         for(int idm=0; idm<parms->ndm; idm++){
00270             nnx[idm]=parms->dm[idm].histn;
00271             nny[idm]=simu->dmint[0]->p[idm]->nx*simu->dmint[0]->p[idm]->ny;
00272         }
00273         simu->dmhist=dcellnew_mmap(parms->ndm, 1, nnx, nny, "dmhist_%d.bin",simu->seed);
00274         //simu->dmhist=dcellnew(parms->ndm,1);
00275         }
00276         for(int idm=0; idm<parms->ndm; idm++){
00277         dhistfill(&simu->dmhist->p[idm], simu->dmint[0]->p[idm],0,
00278               parms->dm[idm].histbin, parms->dm[idm].histn);
00279         }
00280     }
00281     if(parms->save.dmpttr){//2 cycle delay.
00282         dcellwrite(simu->dmint[0], "dmpttr_%d/dmpttr_%d.bin",simu->seed,simu->isim+2);
00283     }
00284     double totalptt[3]={0,0,0};
00285     for(int idm=0; idm<ndm; idm++){
00286         totalptt[1]+=ptt->p[idm]->p[1];
00287         totalptt[2]+=ptt->p[idm]->p[2];
00288     }
00289     //Add tip/tilt back to the ground DM only.
00290     loc_add_ptt(simu->dmint[0]->p[0]->p, totalptt, recon->aloc[0]);
00291     dcellfree(ptt);
00292     }
00293     //Uplink 
00294     dcellcp(&simu->uptreal, simu->uptint[0]);
00295     //shift_inte(simt->napupt,simt->apupt,simu->uptint);
00296     if(simu->upterr){
00297     //uplink tip/tilt mirror. use Integrator/Derivative control
00298     //update command for next step.
00299     double gain1=simt->epupt+simt->dpupt;
00300     double gain2=-simt->dpupt;
00301     dcelladd(&simu->uptint[0], 1., simu->upterr,gain1);
00302     dcelladd(&simu->uptint[0], 1., simu->upterrlast,gain2);
00303         //save to use in next servo time step.
00304     dcellcp(&simu->upterrlast,simu->upterr);
00305     }
00306 }

void filter_ol ( SIM_T *  simu  ) 

filter DM commands in open loop mode by simply copy the output 

00310                            {
00311     if(!simu->parms->sim.closeloop){
00312     if(simu->dmerr_hi){
00313         dcellcp(&simu->dmreal, simu->dmerr_hi);
00314     }else{
00315         dcellzero(simu->dmreal);
00316     }
00317     if(simu->Merr_lo){
00318         addlow2dm(&simu->dmreal, simu, simu->Merr_lo,1);
00319     }
00320     }else{
00321     error("Invalid\n");
00322     }
00323 
00324     calc_cachedm(simu);
00325 }

void filter ( SIM_T *  simu  ) 

Does the servo filtering by calling filter_cl() or filter_ol(). 

00329                         {
00330     if(simu->parms->sim.closeloop){
00331     if(simu->parms->save.dm){
00332         dcellwrite(simu->dmreal, "dmreal_%d/dmreal_%d.bin", simu->seed,simu->isim);
00333     }

00339     }
00340     }
